CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aether Market relative to Starfall Mart?
SRP.A: Aether Market is {below} Starfall Mart in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironwood Market}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starfall Mart}.

VE.Q: What is Starfall Mart's Price Index in 1993?
VE.A: Starfall Mart's price index in 1993 is {150.80} index.

VE.Q: What is Aether Market's Price Index in 1996?
VE.A: Aether Market's price index in 1996 is {127.90} index.

VE.Q: What is Aether Market's Price Index in 2002?
VE.A: Aether Market's price index in 2002 is {112.25} index.

VE.Q: What are the price index of Aether Market, Starfall Mart, and Nova Exchange in 1995?
VE.A: Aether Market's price index is {172.43} index, Starfall Mart's price index is {122.57} index, Nova Exchange's price index is {163.88} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Price Index in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum price index is {38.98} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Price Index in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum price index is {305.11} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Price Index level recorded for Aether Market?
EVJ.A: Aether Market reached approximately {189.68} index in {2004}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Price Index level recorded for Aether Market?
EVJ.A: Aether Market's lowest recorded level is approximately {112.25} index in {2002}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Price Index?
SC.A: The average total price index is {814.13} index.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Price Index go below 775.36 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Price Index exceed 847.66 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Price Index fall between 770.94 and 852.09 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 2005, was the average total Price Index higher or lower than between 1996 and 1999?
NC.A: The average total price index between 1997 and 2005 was {higher} than between 1996 and 1999.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2006, did the total Price Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1998 and 1999?
NC.A: The change in total price index between 2000 and 2006 was {smaller} than between 1998 and 1999.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2003, was the average total Price Index higher or lower than between 1993 and 1999?
NC.A: The average total price index between 1998 and 2003 was {higher} than between 1993 and 1999.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 2000 higher or lower than in 2001?
NC.A: The total price index in 2000 was {higher} than in 2001.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Ironwood Market} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Starfall Mart, Aether Market, Echo Trade, Nova Exchange, Ironwood Market}.
